entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:01 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 11:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
